cards.html:
For this week’s Switch Kickstarter Project of the Week, we will be looking at Cloud M1’s Ayo The Clown. The game is slated to release in August 2020 on PC and Nintendo Switch if the stretch goal is reached. Here’s the rundown:

Ayo the Clown is about courage, love, friendship, and the amazing things that happen when you never give up. 

With Ayo the Clown, we’d like to reintroduce you to the incredibly fun platformer games of the ‘90s where platforming is accompanied by an inspiring and memorable story. 

Ayo the clown has a very unique and cute art style that everybody loves. Expect the unexpected as this clown takes you through a world of imagination. Just think, if Super Mario Bros., Yoshi, Kirby, and Little Big Planet had a child, this would be it.

Ayo The Clown requires $17,000USD and is currently sitting at $17,370USD after 407 backers with only 5 days remaining. However in regards to guaranteeing a Nintendo Switch port, the project requires $35,000USD.

Click here to check out Ayo The Clown

 

Click here to check out last week’s Kickstarter Project: Chicory: A Colorful Tale

Thank you to our $5 and up Patreon Backer for their ongoing support:

  • Belinda Cubitt
